Title: The Internship
Overview: Two recently laid-off men in their 40s try to make it as interns at a successful Internet company where their managers are in their 20s.
Tagline: Hiring them was a brilliant mistake.
Keywords: job interview, loss of job, intern, reference to google, new job, laid off, transamerica pyramid
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Regency Enterprises, 21 Laps Entertainment, Wild West Picture Show Productions, TSG Entertainment
Cast: Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Rose Byrne
